name: Fire Mage
description: A spellcaster with a focus on destructive fire spells. A perfect class for those who wish to deal large amounts of damage to many enemies.

name: Paladin
description: A warrior of the light that uses its god-given powers to defend the living.

name: Fanatic
description: A crazed lunatic who worships the Blood God. Has the potential for great power, but power comes at a cost.
